posts.post_content:
*card is sold*

Evening Folks,

Am trying to make a move on a whale, but this one will have to go to make it happen.  Am committed to move this, so if you're interested at all, let's negotiate.

PayPal preferred, shipping included.  

Scans available here:  [IMG]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/baseball/Toronto/T215_Kelley.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks for looking.

Regards,

Richard.
[url]richard@richardarmstrong.ca[/url]
